projects.title: Fantasy Stock Trading App
projects.description: • Built a stock trading simulator using React, Flask, SQL, and the Finnhub API.  　  　  　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 • Designed a scalable, secure backend with DRY and modular principles.  　 　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 • Refined full-stack expertise through a 16-month mentorship.

image.alt: Picture of Fantasy Stock Trading App

projects.title: Twitter Showcase App
projects.description: • Developed a mock Twitter search app with React and Flask.  　  　  　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 　　  　　 　　• Processed API data in real time with error handling.  　• Enhanced backend skills with Flask and multi-language integration.  　  　  　  　　 　　 　　 　　 　　 　　  　 • Showcased seamless technology integration for functionality.

image.alt: Picture of mock Twitter app homepage

projects.title: Chat App
projects.description: • Built a real-time chat app inspired by Slack using React & Socket.IO.  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　 • Created a secure backend with Flask, SQL, and JWT authentication.  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　 • Implemented web sockets for live, multi-user messaging.  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　  　 • Designed a responsive UI with Bootstrap.
